Html: Where it is possible to look examples of usage QuickGraph without GLEE
What kind of examples are you looking for? If you are trying to render graphs, QuickGraph only supports GLEE now.

pelikhan wrote:
What kind of examples are you looking for? If you are trying to render graphs, QuickGraph only supports GLEE now.


Now rendering is not necessary for me, I am interested more with obtaining coordinates of the graph, for example such as on this link.
http://www.graphviz.org/Gallery/directed/datastruct.html

Today we use NGRAPHVIZ for obtaining SVG format, in it receive all necessary coordinates, basically us any other XML format containing arranges also coordinates.

I'm sorry for my bad English
I'm sorry I don't plan to support graphviz (maybe output of dot files in the future).
I've checked in dot support in. You will have to do the ngraphviz binding (see doc).

Hi Pelikhan,

Can you show me how to look example of Quick Graph using Glee (visualize)?
